name: The Armored Zephyr
description: The Armored Zephyr is a Strategy RPG revolved around smart movement, placement and taking advantage of enemy weakness.  All of this can be executed and achieved through using the Elemental weaknesses by allowing an additional action should you hit an enemy that is weak to certain elements. This allows you get the advantage by attacking multiple targets through proper movement or focus down a target you view as a danger to the rest of your units.
